nodes.bodyText: nice catch! Can you please add test cases to KubeNotificationProcessorTest so we ensure no regressions going forward?

I think we should stick with DNS naming conventions for annotations and labels, so all lowercase characters:
https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#dns-subdomain-names
https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/annotations/#syntax-and-character-set
I suggest .../job-id and .../task-id. See how machine-id and machine-group were chosen below, rather than machineId. Alternatively, it could also be .../jobid and .../taskid.
I like the idea. Changing this to job-id and task-id.
